name: SpaceFactsForKids
0:
”Alexa open space facts”
”Alexa ask space facts to give me a fact”
”Alexa space facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: space facts
des: This Alexa skill is primarily meant as a tool to educate kids in a fun, engaging way. It has over 50 different facts regarding Space and our Solar System, including facts about every planet!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
